channel.title: Quest Help!
channel.description:
Okay, so I've realized that I have an absolutely horrible account. So, I decided to boost up my account in the areas it is lacking, the major one being quests. I'm level 113 in combat and have 120 Quest Points, before I started questing I had about 90. But, I've come across two quests that I cannot complete without help, so I've come to moparscape.
I need a Black Arms gang member to help me with Shield of Arrav. I've got the half of the shield from the Phoenix Hideout in my bank and I've also grabbed a couple Weapon Store Keys. So, all I need is someone to grab the other half from the Black Arms gang hideout from my understanding.
Also, when I complete the Shield of Arrav, I've already completed everything for The Heroes' Quest other than the Shield of Arrav so I'll need help with that quest aswell. I'm willing to help-out anyone willing to help me with anything.
If you would like to help me post here or message me, I'll message you back with my Runescape name.

item.title: Quest Help!

item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Hopefully the topic will do. Is there some sort of reference for popular clan chats? I know there are some for world 81 gilded altars and a few others but I can’t ever remember the names.

Read full topic

item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:1, topic:459074”]http://services.runescape.com/m=forum/forums.ws?20,21,513,63428984

^ shield of array partners

RuneScape

RuneScape Forum - Community Forums for Clans, Feedback & Discussion

Join the discussion on the official RuneScape forum. Share your thoughts with the community, ask questions, find help, learn about events and much more.

^ heroes quest partners

enjoy , that is the BEST place to get a partner at[/quote]

Didn’t know they had this. Thanks.

Read full topic
